thread.title: Great Hotel!
thread.title_full: Great Hotel! - Review of Holiday Inn New York City - Times Square, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Susie H
title: Great Hotel!
text: The staff was Great! We had arrive pretty early in the morning and asked if there was any way we could get an early check in. They were able to get us an early check in, which was surprising saying it was 2 days New Year's Eve. Also our fight got canceled for our way home and they were able to accommodate us till we were able to get another fight home.
